author: yperbasis
content: <@393119312350543872> Can you please refill withdrawals tests after <@360491619402776577> & <@543900561460822016> have switched geth to use gwei instead of wei as the amount unit (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6325, https://github.com/MariusVanDerWijden/go-ethereum/tree/wei-to-gwei)

author: dimitry8570
content: Yes. Although some eips branches (tests) that were generated for Shanghai using different geth versions would need to be rebased on this change as well
